page.title: 06British Rail
page.content: (BRITISH RAIL:)On week days there are as many as 14 trains in each direction stopping in Harborough.The fastest (Inter-City 125)service to St.Pancras takes 68 mins.The last train from London arrives in Harborough at 0152,and the first train departs at 0245. (PUBLIC AND PRIVATE ROAD TRANSPORT:) Most local villages are servad by buses operating between 0700-1800 only.Daily,long distance coach services to East coast towns and resorts,and North to Glasgow and Edinburgh,stop in Market Harborough. (TRAFFIC PATTERNS:)Most traffic passing through the town follows the A6 though heavy goods lorries tend to travel in an East/West direction.(FUEL COSTS:)Petrol:2.06,Diesal:1.96. (HARBILT:)construct a variety of light weight electrical commercial vehicles with an average range of 45km at 15kph
